name: NinNeko in Halloween World
description:
Looking for game testers to help NinNeko in Halloween World!

A work in progress game the first two stages are now available for the early access beta test.

Controls:

  • Walk
    • Arrow Keys
    • WASD Keys
    • Joystick Dpad / Analog Stick
  • Attack
    • Z
    • Mouse Click
    • Joystick Button
  • Jump
    • Up arrow
    • W
    • Joystick Button
  • Pause Game
    • Enter Key

Thank you for playing the Early Access Beta Test. Windows build first, Mac and Linux versions incoming. Maybe one day even a Nintendo Switch and Playstation and XBox version.
